mapper.select: SELECT p.id ,p.category ,p.title ,p.content ,p.created_at ,p.created_by ,p.modified_at ,p.modified_by ,m.nickname as modified_name FROM policy p LEFT JOIN member m ON p.modified_by = m.id WHERE category = #{type}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO policy (id,title,category,content,modified_at,modified_by,created_at,created_by) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{category},#{content},now(),#{modifiedBy},now(),#{modifiedBy}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = VALUES(title),content = VALUES(content),category = VALUES(category), modified_at = now(), modified_by=VALUES(modified_by);
